lead_paragraph: Jonathan Rockefeller, the creator of a show based on Eric Carle’s beloved children’s book, has a very grown-up home.

headline.print_headline: A Man Who Treats Caterpillars With Care

snippet: Jonathan Rockefeller, the creator of a show based on Eric Carle’s beloved children’s book, has a very grown-up home.
abstract: Director and Australian native Jonathan Rockefeller, creator of The Very Hungry Caterpillar Show and Baz Luhrmann protege, loves his East 57th Street apartment, which he and his husband have filled with Eric Carle-inspired puppets, stuffed creatures and contemporary art.
